roleset.name: treat an illness completely
roleset.note: CURE-V NOTES: This is by far the most common structure. Think about it. (from cure.01-v)
CURE-N NOTES: Added due to expansion fo Nombank. Comparison to'cure.01-v'. Vn classes cheat-10.6 and free-80-1. Fn class cure.Framed by Katie. (from cure.01-n)
CURATIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from curative.01-j)

example.name: cure-v: doctor and patient
example.text: Then, just as [the Tramp]-1 is given *trace-1*-3 a blind girl*trace-2* *trace-3* to cure *trace-4* in ``City Lights,'' theArtist is put in charge of returning a two-year-old waif (NicoleAlysia), whose father has been murdered by thugs, to her mother.

example.name: cure-v: doctor and illness
example.text: The big question is whether [the new president]-1 will havethe strength and the political support in Congress *trace*-1 totake steps *trace*-1 to cure Brazil's economic ills.

example.name: cure-v: treatment and illness
example.text: It could point to plenty of ailments that [the Spanish economic rejuvenation]-1 so far has failed *trace-1* to cure *trace-2*.

example.name: cure-v: all args
example.text: Mary cured John of debilitating migraines with amputation.

example.name: cure-n: Arg 2
example.text: cures for diseases that cause a lot of pain and death to millions of people
example.arg: for diseases that cause a lot of pain and death to millions of people

example.name: cure-n: Arg 0 and 2
example.text: Researchers' possible cure for the disease

roleset.name: preserve (as in meat or hide)
roleset.note: CURE-V NOTES: Frame added by Arrick (from cure.02-v)

example.name: smokin'
example.text: [Curing barns]-3 were then used [*]-3 [*]-3 to fire-curetobacco, but a dozen or so years ago tobacco curing technologychanged, and computers were brought * in * to control the process.

roleset.name: able to be cured
roleset.note: CURABLE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to cure.01. Cure.01 is a member of VN classes cheat-10.6 and free-80-1.Framed by Katie. (from curable.01-j)

example.name: Differentiate between args 1 and 2!
example.text: His liver was curable for cancer.

example.name: Also, if you can add a doctor argument, mark the instrument as arg 3.
example.text: Thalassemia is curable with homeopathic treatment.
